mapper.select: SELECT SI.id AS tradeSalesItemId , SI.gacha_id , SI.trade_id , SI.gacha_item_id , GI.name AS gachaItemName , SI.price , SI.count , SI.current_count , SI.created_at FROM TRADE_SALES_ITEM SI LEFT JOIN GACHA_ITEM GI ON GI.id = SI.gacha_item_id AND GI.gacha_id = SI.gacha_id WHERE SI.trade_id = #{tradeId} ORDER BY SI.id ASC

SELECT EI.id AS tradeExchangeItemId , EI.gacha_id , EI.trade_id , EI.give_item_id , (SELECT name FROM GACHA_ITEM WHERE id = EI.give_item_id AND gacha_id = EI.gacha_id) AS giveItemName , EI.want_item_id , (SELECT name FROM GACHA_ITEM WHERE id = EI.want_item_id AND gacha_id = EI.gacha_id) AS wantItemName , EI.created_at FROM TRADE_EXCHANGE_ITEM EI WHERE trade_id = #{tradeId} ORDER BY EI.id ASC
SELECT GI.id AS gachaItemId, GI.name FROM GACHA_ITEM GI WHERE GI.gacha_id = (SELECT gacha_id FROM TRADE WHERE id = #{tradeId}) ORDER BY GI.created_at ASC
